comment: Professor Chamberlain is a wonderful person and professor. She is very flexible with students and understanding of other classes course loads. It was the first semester of the improved Production 2 course, and Sandee handled it very well and it was a great start to learning rigging! Plenty of room for learning more if you're interested as well!

Prof Chamberlain is amazing. She was always accessible outside of class and she was always willing to help if we needed it. Only 5 big assignments in the class so we can focus on them rather than trying to take quizzes/tests too. If we needed extra time for a project, she gave it to us. Great professor and I highly recommend her.

She missed class on the last day before spring break to see a ball game with her father without notifying students that she would be absent beforehand. Another professor informed students of the occurrence, letting them into the classroom and offering assistance, although they had their own course running simultaneously

How do you describe the best professor ever? AMAZING! I've yet to meet someone that didn't enjoy her as a professor. Very inspirational and understanding of student's needs. Always optimistic and goes that extra mile. You can tell she loves her job and her students!

Invested in seeing students succeed; does extra research to help students create professional looking projects easily; allows time for exploration and creativity. Understands that students are adults with responsibilities and interests outside of the classroom, but expects great work because of the freedom she allows. Great for upper level classes.
